Grove City College

Website Redesign

Grove City College has a unique way of offering tuition aid, which often confused past applicants when they applied to the college through the website. The fully responsive website redesign easily solves student's past problems and has led to an increase in applicants.

As the lead developer on this project, I worked with Smith Bros Agency to:
  • Meet the client's technical requirements of building the site using the CMS, DotNetNuke (DNN)
  • Collaborate with the creative team to build interactive style guides, component-based prototypes, and templates that were later converted into a DNN theme
  • Present each phase of the website to the client and respond to any client's needs using layman's terms
